message: Say you wanted to get people on your minecraft server to all collaborate on a project, you could organise it here - or assuming this gets popular, you can ask questions, get help, share servers and stuff
Hello!  Convore in general seems really cool - like IRC, but with topics and history.
i really like the idea of the tech though - like a community IM - think it should be really good for collaborative project work
Hellooo.... I think I get it. I was worried that all the responses would be tweeteded.
It might be a bit "late" now. But I have a Tron lightbike and wanted to do something like this... but on a huge scale
I'm addicted to convore AND minecraft. Somebody help me
Are you coming to play on the server soon?
I'm bored and need some encouragement. I had an idea for a project but... I need help to stay encouraged I think
i don't seem to have any time.. .but I will make some
I have to say, I am also a little addicted to Convore - trying to get back into minecraft, but I thought it needed a group on here
i don't think I have played since beta started : (
